si.title: පරිසර ඇමති ලෙස ජනක වකුම්බුර
body_lines: சுற்றாடல் இராஜாங்க அமைச்சராக ஜானக வக்கும்புர சற்று முன்னர் ஜனாதிபதி செயலகத்தில் ஜனாதிபதி ரணில் விக்கிரமசிங்க முன்னிலையில் பதவிப்பிரமாணம் செய்துகொண்டார்.
ඔහු දැනටමත් පරිසර රාජ්ය අමාත්යවරයා ලෙස දිවුරුම් දී ඇති අතර එය දැන් පළාත් සභා සහ පළාත් පාලන ඇමති ලෙස දිවුරුම් දී තිබේ.

en.title: Janaka Wakumbura as Minister of Environment
body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe was sworn in as the Minister of Environment in the presence of President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the Presidential Secretariat.
He has already been sworn in as the Minister of State for Environment and has now been sworn in as provincial councils and local government minister.

summary_lines: Janaka Wakumbura, sworn in as Minister of Environment, also holds positions as Minister of State for Environment, provincial councils, and local government minister.
